hibernate-mapping.query: select new depodenodto ( d.GroupNo, d.Tlf_Eno, d.Amount ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.Tlf_Eno = :eno and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and d.Active = true
select new depodenodto ( d.AccountType, d.Income, d.Communicationcharge ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.GroupNo = :entryNo and d.Reverse_Status = false and d.Active=true

select new depodenodto( d.Id, d.GroupNo, d.Tlf_Eno, d.AccountType, d.Amount, d.Reverse_Status, d.Income, d.Communicationcharge, d.UniqueId, d.SourceBranchCode, d.Currency, d.Active, d.TS, d.CreatedDate, d.CreatedUserId, d.UpdatedDate, d.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.Active = true and d.SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode
delete from TLMORM00009 where SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode and Active = true

select new depodenodto ( Sum(depodeno.Amount) as Amount ) from TLMORM00009 as depodeno where depodeno.GroupNo = :GroupNo and depodeno.Tlf_Eno!= :ENO and depodeno.Active=true and depodeno.Reverse_Status=false and depodeno.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode

update TLMORM00009 depodeno set depodeno.Reverse_Status=true ,depodeno.UpdatedUserId= :UpdatedUserId ,depodeno.UpdatedDate= :updatedDate where depodeno.GroupNo = :GroupNo and depodeno.Tlf_Eno = :ENO and depodeno.Active=true and depodeno.Reverse_Status=false and depodeno.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode

update TLMORM00009 depodeno set depodeno.Reverse_Status=true ,depodeno.UpdatedUserId= :UpdatedUserId ,depodeno.UpdatedDate= :updatedDate where depodeno.GroupNo = :GroupNo and depodeno.Active=true and depodeno.Reverse_Status=false and depodeno.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode

update TLMORM00009 depodeno set depodeno.Active=false ,depodeno.Reverse_Status=true ,depodeno.UpdatedUserId= :UpdatedUserId ,depodeno.UpdatedDate= :updatedDate where depodeno.GroupNo = :GroupNo and depodeno.Tlf_Eno!= :ENO and depodeno.Active=true and depodeno.Reverse_Status=false and depodeno.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode
select d.GroupNo from TLMORM00009 as d where d.AccountType = :acType and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and d.Active = true and d.Reverse_Status = false
select sum(d.Amount) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.GroupNo = :groupNo and d.AccountType != :acType and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and d.Active = true
select d.Amount from TLMORM00009 as d where d.GroupNo = :groupNo and d.AccountType = :acType and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and d.Active = true

update TLMORM00009 d set d.Active = false, d.Reverse_Status=true, d.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, d.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where d.GroupNo = :groupNo and d.AccountType = :acType and d.Reverse_Status = false and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and d.Active = true

update TLMORM00009 d set d.Amount = :amount, d.Reverse_Status = true, d.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, d.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where d.GroupNo = :groupNo and d.AccountType = :acType and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and d.Active = true

select new depodenodto ( d.GroupNo, d.Reverse_Status ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.GroupNo = :groupNo and d.AccountType =:poNo and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranch and d.Reverse_Status = false and d.Active = true
select sum(d.Amount) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.GroupNo = :groupNo and d.AccountType !=:poNo and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranch and d.Reverse_Status = false and d.Active = true

update TLMORM00009 depodeno set depodeno.Reverse_Status=1 ,depodeno.Active = :active ,depodeno.UpdatedUserId= :updatedUserId ,depodeno.UpdatedDate= :updatedDate where depodeno.GroupNo = :groupNo and (depodeno.Tlf_Eno = :poNo or depodeno.AccountType=:poNo) and depodeno.SourceBranchCode= :sourceBranch and depodeno.Active=true

select new depodenodto( d.Id, d.GroupNo, d.Tlf_Eno, d.AccountType, d.Amount, d.Reverse_Status, d.Income, d.Communicationcharge, d.UniqueId, d.SourceBranchCode, d.Currency, d.Active, d.TS, d.CreatedDate, d.CreatedUserId, d.UpdatedDate, d.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.AccountType = :poNo and d.Tlf_Eno = :Tlf_Eno and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranch and d.Active = true

select new depodenodto ( d.AccountType, d.Amount, d.Active, d.Tlf_Eno ) from TLMORM00009 as d , TLMORM00015 as c where c.TlfEntryNo = d.GroupNo and c.Status = :status and d.GroupNo = :entryNo and d.Reverse_Status = false and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebranch and d.Active=true

delete from TLMORM00009 where GroupNo in (select c.TlfEntryNo from TLMORM00015 as c where SourceBranchCode=:sourcebranchcode and convert(char(10), c.CashDate, 111) between :startDate and :endDate) and Active = true
select new depodenodto ( d.AccountType, d.Tlf_Eno, d.Amount ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.Tlf_Eno = :entryNo and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and d.Active=true
select new depodenodto ( d.AccountType, d.Tlf_Eno, d.Amount, d.Currency ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.GroupNo = :entryNo and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and d.Active=true

select new depodenodto ( d.AccountType, d.Tlf_Eno, d.Reverse_Status ) from TLMORM00009 as d where d.Tlf_Eno = :entryNo and d.GroupNo = :groupNo and d.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and d.Reverse_Status =false and d.Active=true
